column3: is a website operated by Robert Ireland. It is an extensive online linguistic dictionary of people and places.  Sample output:

column7: ''lor-'' in names [Etym]; perhaps implied is '''NGOL-''' wise
column9: magic [Etym]; -ion forms a masc. name suffix from '''YO'''
column11: Q & Nol ''-ion'' [Etym]; Inglorion = ''Mind of gold'' (''-en'' wisdom?); an Elf at [[Rivendell]].
